page.title:
Purpose and Objectives
Purpose and Objectives
page.normal_text:
For CMMI Maturity Level 2 stakeholder involvement in key activities must be planned, monitored, and controlled.
For CMMI Maturity Level 2 stakeholder involvement in key
activities must be planned, monitored, and controlled.
page.enlisting:
Purpose: Review the overall approach to planning, monitoring and controlling stakeholder coordination throughout your project Objective - After this session you should know: – Who your stakeholders may be – How to plan for stakeholder coordination – Approaches to monitoring and controlling stakeholder – The kind of records to keep for stakeholder coordination – Some pitfalls associated with stakeholder coordination Purpose: Review the overall approach to planning, monitoring and controlling stakeholder coordination throughout your project Objective - After this session you should know: – Who your stakeholders may be – How to plan for stakeholder coordination – Approaches to monitoring and controlling stakeholder
